recipesJson.name: Butterscotch Banana Ice Cream | BMW | Developed
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, and Folkart.
This is our version of a Easy Lemon Custard made especially for the new mixer in mind using our Beginner Flavor List from Beginner Mixer's Week on DEVELOPED ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3oifO5GG678 ).

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

reviews.text: I really want to try this, so badly that I don't want to wait for my order containing (TPA) Banana Cream to get here.  Do you think I could substitute (MB) Soft Banana and (FLV) Vanilla Pudding at a 2:1 ratio?  I also have (TPA) Banana Nut Bread but I think that would change the profile of the original recipe?  I'm new so don't laugh.  ðŸ˜‰. I had good results using all three in a recipe by Folkart earlier so know the Soft Banana and Vanilla Pudding will be a creamy yum note!

Mixed this up and tried it at the 5 day recommended steep.  Did not really care for it.  I could taste the butterscotch and banana but it wasn't doing it for me.  Came back to it after going through some of the full bottle test mixes I had laying around  and tried it again.  Absolutely delicious.  The longer this steeps the better in my book.  Everything blends so well.  Perfect at 2 months.
I was never so excited to try something I never even thought I wanted. Everything came together perfectly for this mix.
Really enjoying this. Creamy nana butterscotch. Well done lads.

pageContext.name: Butterscotch Banana Ice Cream | BMW | Developed
